metadata.name: Luck Cycles Dataset
metadata.description: Complete data for BaZi luck cycles including Major Luck (大运), Annual Luck (流年), and Monthly Luck (流月) calculations and interpretations
metadata.author: FatePath BaZi Master

fields.name: calculationMethod
fields.example: Based on birth month and gender

fields.name: influence
fields.description: Areas of life this cycle influences

fields.name: characteristics
fields.description: Key characteristics of this cycle type

fields.name: interpretation
fields.description: How to interpret this cycle in BaZi analysis
fields.example: This cycle represents major life themes and opportunities

data.calculationMethod: Based on birth month and gender, using Heavenly Stem sequence
data.interpretation: Major Luck cycles represent the most significant periods in life, lasting 10 years each. They determine major life themes, career directions, and personal development opportunities.

data.calculationMethod: Based on current year's Heavenly Stem and Earthly Branch
data.interpretation: Annual Luck shows the energy and themes for each specific year, indicating opportunities, challenges, and areas of focus for that year.

data.calculationMethod: Based on current month's Heavenly Stem and Earthly Branch
data.interpretation: Monthly Luck influences day-to-day activities and short-term projects, providing guidance for monthly planning and decision-making.

data.calculationMethod: Based on current day's Heavenly Stem and Earthly Branch
data.interpretation: Daily Luck affects immediate decisions, mood, and energy levels for each specific day.

data.calculationMethod: Based on current hour's Heavenly Stem and Earthly Branch
data.interpretation: Hourly Luck is used for precise timing of important activities and understanding energy fluctuations throughout the day.

majorLuck.description: How to calculate Major Luck cycles

rules.description: Men start from birth month and go forward, women start from birth month and go backward
Each Major Luck cycle lasts exactly 10 years
Follows the natural sequence of Heavenly Stems: Jia, Yi, Bing, Ding, Wu, Ji, Geng, Xin, Ren, Gui
Based on the Heavenly Stem and Earthly Branch of the current year
Analyze how the year's energy interacts with the person's birth chart

interpretationGuidelines.majorLuck: Major Luck cycles are the most important in BaZi analysis, representing major life themes and directions
interpretationGuidelines.annualLuck: Annual Luck shows yearly opportunities and challenges, useful for annual planning
interpretationGuidelines.monthlyLuck: Monthly Luck guides monthly activities and short-term decision making
interpretationGuidelines.dailyLuck: Daily Luck affects immediate mood and energy, useful for daily planning
interpretationGuidelines.hourlyLuck: Hourly Luck is used for precise timing of important activities
